NOTES_EMPTY_CONTENT: Currently there are no updates to the bulletin¡I {{date|date:'short'}}
NOTES_20160107_CONTENT: This APP is now ready for public access. With this APP, users will be able to survey all products provided by FIMEX. Currently, we have four language interfaces. However, only the English version has detailed product information.  Translation of detailed product information for the other languages are yet to be implemented. Sorry for the inconvenience.
NOTES_20160108_CONTENT: If you want to share your experience of using this APP or show your interests in FIMEX product, please send message via CONTACT US form in the SETTING Tab. We will get in contact you as soon as possible.
NOTES_20160109_CONTENT: Please double click on BACK/EXIT within 5 seconds to exit this app.
NOTES_20160211_CONTENT: Fixed some bugs and added Bookmarking function. Now you can bookmark products of interest. The bookmarks list will be attached to messages by sending enquiries.
